member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Analyze.ModelDescriptionData.ConfusionMatrix
member.summary: An output confusion matrix. This shows an estimate for how this model will do in predictions. This is first indexed by the true class label. For each true class label, this provides a pair {predicted_label, count}, where count is the estimated number of times the model will predict the predicted label given the true label. Will not output if more then 100 classes [Categorical models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Analyze.ModelDescriptionData.ConfusionMatrixRowTotals
member.summary: A list of the confusion matrix row totals

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Analyze.ModelDescriptionData.ConfusionMatrixData
member.summary: An output confusion matrix. This shows an estimate for how this model will do in predictions. This is first indexed by the true class label. For each true class label, this provides a pair {predicted_label, count}, where count is the estimated number of times the model will predict the predicted label given the true label. Will not output if more then 100 classes [Categorical models only].

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Analyze.ModelDescriptionData.ConfusionMatrixRowTotalsData
member.summary: A list of the confusion matrix row totals

member.summary: Google storage location of the preprocessing pmml file.

member.summary: Google storage location of the pmml model file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Training.TrainingComplete
member.summary: Training completion time (as a RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Training.TrainingStatus
member.summary: The current status of the training job. This can be one of following: RUNNING; DONE; ERROR; ERROR: TRAINING JOB NOT FOUND

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Training.Utility
member.summary: A class weighting function, which allows the importance weights for class labels to be specified [Categorical models only].

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Training.ModelInfoData
member.summary: Model metadata.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.ClassWeightedAccuracy
member.summary: Estimated accuracy of model taking utility weights into account [Categorical models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.ClassificationAccuracy
member.summary: A number between 0.0 and 1.0, where 1.0 is 100% accurate. This is an estimate, based on the amount and quality of the training data, of the estimated prediction accuracy. You can use this is a guide to decide whether the results are accurate enough for your needs. This estimate will be more reliable if your real input data is similar to your training data [Categorical models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.MeanSquaredError
member.summary: An estimated mean squared error. The can be used to measure the quality of the predicted model [Regression models only].

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.ModelType
member.summary: Type of predictive model (CLASSIFICATION or REGRESSION)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.NumberInstances
member.summary: Number of valid data instances used in the trained model.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Training.ModelInfoData.NumberLabels
member.summary: Number of class labels in the trained model [Categorical models only].

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Training.UtilityData
member.summary: Class label (string).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Update.CsvInstance
member.summary: The input features for this instance

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Prediction.v1_5.Data.Update.Label
member.summary: The true class label of this instance
